title: Sunfire Castle
content:
At day 53, the following aspects of the game unlock/update:

Sunfire Castle

Alliances within the state can battle for the control of the Sunfire Castle. When a President is elected, minister positions can be assigned.

  • The Sunfire Castle Battle happens on Saturday.

title: Fire Crystal Age Begins!
content:
At day 60, the following aspects of the game unlock/update:

Fire Crystal Age

When 'Road to Discovery' Monument mission ends, Fire Crystal Age will be unlocked in your state and players at Furnace Lv. 30 can upgrade buildings further.

title: State of Power, King of Icefield
content:
At day 80*, the following aspects of the game unlock/update:

State of Power (State vs State=SVS)

The main event of Whiteout Survival. Your state will battle with another state for the control of the Sunfire Castle.

  • There is also going to be a week long preparation phase which replaces Hall of Chiefs event.
    • SVS Prep Phase starts on Monday.
    • The winning state of preparation phase gets to invade the enemy state and attack their Sunfire Castle.
  • One state can hold up to two Sunfire Castles and if that happens, President becomes Supreme President and all the benefits from the Sunfire Castle are enhanced.
  • The SVS Sunfire Castle Battle happens on Saturday.

King of Icefield

Event that replaces Hall of Chiefs in the rotation when SVS is on cooldown. Basically the same thing as Hall of Chiefs, but besides the in-state personal leaderboard, there is also neighboring states leaderboard both on personal and state level.

  • King of the Icefield starts on Monday.

*Note: Both events have its own schedule. If your server isn't around the day the events start on at day 80, you will have one more Hall of Chiefs.

title: Fire Crystal 5, Crystal Laboratory
content:
At day 150, the following aspects of the game unlock/update:

Fire Crystal Age Update

  • Fire Crystal Furnace Lv. 4 and 5 and all the corresponding buildings along with it.
  • New building - Crystal Laboratory! Allows to refine small amount of resources 5 times a day for random number of Fire Crystals (1-5).

Daily Intel Missions Update

  • Increase from an average of 10 Fire Crystals to 20 Fire Crystals a day.

title: Legendary Chief Gear, New Crazy Joe and Mercenary Difficulties
content:
At day 180*, the following aspects of the game unlock/update:

*Most online sources say day 180, but for our server it unlocked at day 170.

Legendary Chief Gear

New tier of Chief Gear, one above Mythic.

Enhancement Material Exchange

Chief Gear Enhancement Material Exchange "Shop" that unlocks if you have at least one piece of Chief Gear at Mythic T2 ***. You can trade Alloy, Solution, Plans and Amber.

More Ways to Obtain Chief Gear Enhancement Materials

  • Crazy Joe
    • New, higher difficulties: 12-21
    • Design Plans and Chief Gear Material Chests added to the reward pool
  • Mercenary Prestige
    • New, higher difficulties: Legend's Initiation
    • Chief Gear Material Chests added to the reward pool
  • Alliance Championship
    • Design Plans added to the Alliance Championship Shop

title: Heroes Generation 4, Hero Shard Updates
content:
At day 195, the following aspects of the game unlock/update:

Heroes of Generation 4

  • [Infantry] Ahmose
  • [Lancer] Reina
  • [Marksman] Lynn - Lucky Wheel Hero

Fortress Battle Rewards Update

Molly and Zinman shards replaced by Philly and Flint shards.

Daily Intel Missions Update

Intel missions award mythic shards of heroes from generation 2 lower than the current generation. For example, at Hero Generation 4, the mythic shard rewards from Intel missions will be for heroes from Generation 2.

Hero Hall Recruitment Update

Molly shards from chests are replaced by shards for mythic heroes from generation 2 lower than the current generation. For example, at Hero Generation 4, Molly shards are replaced by shards for heroes from Generation 2.

Event 'Gina's Revenge' Replaced by 'Hero's Mission'

Similar event, but instead getting Gina shards, you get shards for a mythic hero from the generation 2 lower than the current generation.

  • You can now exchange Horn of Cryptid for Hunter Pouch (was only possible before if you had Gina maxed out).
  • You can now exchange Horn of Cryptid for 2 Gina Shards.
  • You can now exchange Scattered parts for 2 Gina Shards.
  • You can now exchange Scattered parts for Loot (same rewards as Hunter Pouch).
